originalText.text: All promotions are FAKE.I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR A WEEK FOR A GIFT THAT I ORDERED TO BE MADE, THEY SAID IT WOULD BE READY 1/4/24 AND TODAY 1/8/24 THEY DON'T KNOW OWN TO SAY AN EXACT DAY THEY JUST SAID WE WERE CLOSED FOR HOLIDAYS CALL TOMORROW THAT WAS 12/26 AND TODAY IS 01/08/24 I WOULD NEVER BUY FROM THIS JEWELRY AGAIN NEVER.

originalText.text: Best Jewelry store in town. Very professional and skilled staff that are truly helpful. I've been there three times already!

text.text: On of the best customer services

originalText.text: Pero yo nose por que figuras como Sandra Berrocal promueve este establecimiento. Hay una falta de comunicación con este negocio. Uno le escribe por Instagram llama a las dos tiendas y nadie contesta. Uno hace una orden y pasa de una semana a una semana y media y no te envían tu  orden ni nada. Hay que comunicarse con el departamento de consumidor para que hable con el dueño de este establecimiento por que la verdad que el servicio es de lo peor. No vuelvo a ordenar nada de esta joyería. Yo ordene Febrero 02 y ayer me pude comunicar por whatsapp. Y simplemente me dijeron que me mensaje se lo pasaron a la encargada de ordenes de la página web. Y nada aquí están los esperando que ellos contesten. Mejor cómprenle a Javier de jeweler por lo menos le contestan a uno.

text.text: But I don't know why figures like Sandra Berrocal promote this establishment. There is a lack of communication with this business. One writes to him on Instagram, calls both stores and no one answers. You place an order and it goes from a week to a week and a half and they don't send you your order or anything. You have to contact the consumer department to speak with the owner of this establishment because the truth is that the service is the worst. I will not order anything from this jewelry again. I ordered February 02 and yesterday I was able to communicate by WhatsApp. And they simply told me that they would pass the message to the person in charge of ordering the website. And nothing here are waiting for them to answer. Better buy from Javier as a jeweler, at least they answer one of them.

originalText.text: Deverian poner la información correcta!! Es un engaño!! Conducimos des de CT casi dos horas buscando los dísque especiales que tenían. Llegó preguntó por los especiales y no hay ninguno dique se terminaron. Terminó comprándole una cadena para mi hija y ago el financimiento. Cual no lo explican bien.  Me pongo a leer las reglar y polisas que tienen te dan 90 día para pagarlo. Si no lo pagas en esos 90 día el precio del alticulo se duplica. No es por nada a mi me cojieron de mamona y tratando de apoyar al Dominicano salí desencantada. Eso en inglés se llama false advertisement.

text.text: They should put the correct information!! It's a hoax!! We drove from CT for almost two hours looking for the special CDs they had. He arrived and asked about the specials and none were finished. He ended up buying a chain for my daughter and completed the financing. Which they don't explain well. I start reading the regulations and policies that they have give you 90 days to pay it. If you do not pay it within those 90 days, the price of the item doubles. It's not for nothing that they caught me as a sucker and trying to support the Dominican I came out disenchanted. That in English is called false advertisement.
